subtitle: Something unclear?
title: Frequently Asked Questions
description: Find quick answers about ordering, delivery, and how iBuyFlowers makes sourcing fresh flowers easy for florists and event planners.

faqs.question: How long do your flowers stay fresh?
faqs.answer: Our fresh flowers typically last 7-10 days with proper care. We provide care instructions with every order to help you maximize their lifespan.

faqs.question: What areas do you deliver to?
faqs.answer: We deliver nationwide across the United States. Same-day delivery is available in select metropolitan areas, while standard delivery takes 1-2 business days.

faqs.question: Can I schedule delivery for a specific date?
faqs.answer: Yes! You can schedule delivery up to 30 days in advance. Simply select your preferred delivery date during checkout.

faqs.question: Do you offer custom arrangements?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Our expert florists can create custom arrangements for any occasion. Contact us with your specific requirements and we'll create something beautiful just for you.

faqs.question: What if I'm not satisfied with my order?
faqs.answer: We guarantee 100% satisfaction. If you're not happy with your flowers, contact us within 24 hours and we'll make it right with a replacement or full refund.
